title: When you win a hard fought game, and one of your teammates says EZ

replies.body: When your 0/17/2 Janna says ez at the end of the game
if she went 0/17/2 and still won... you cant argue that it was ez for her.
well he might be telling the truth if you carried the game. Would be "ez" for them not so much for you.
"Ez" used as a mockery should grant 36 hours of chat ban stacking to weeks if they keep it up.
its lovely how triggered you people can get from 2 letters. Aaah~ â™¥ makes me wanna say that after every game.
